fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Guess what one of your abilities are. Multitask-able with any ability

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the beginning of the game, gain three abilities in the form of emojis. If you try to use an ability in a way that isn't valid, it'll be as if you didn't act at all

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: figure out the exact effect of your abilities and correctly guess them
